select count(*) FROM categories where parent_id = #{cat_id}

select isbn,book_title, (select listagg(author, ', ') within group (order by author) from book_author where isbn = book.isbn) as authors, price, publisher from book where isbn IN (select isbn from book_categories where cat_id = #{cat_id})
select cat_name from categories where cat_id=#{cat_id}

SELECT isbn, book_title, (SELECT LISTAGG(author, ', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY author) FROM book_author WHERE isbn = book.isbn) AS authors, publisher, price, stock, TO_CHAR(pub_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS pub_date, TO_CHAR(reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS reg_date, cat_id, image_name FROM book WHERE isbn = #{isbn, jdbcType=BIGINT}

SELECT (SELECT LISTAGG(c.cat_name, ' > ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY LEVEL DESC) FROM categories c START WITH c.cat_id = bc.cat_id CONNECT BY PRIOR c.parent_id = c.cat_id) AS categoryPath FROM book b JOIN book_categories bc ON b.isbn = bc.isbn WHERE b.isbn = #{isbn, jdbcType=BIGINT}
